DESCRIPTION: An additional effect that is triggered if you've played a potion this turn.
Reduces Damage dealt by half and deals damage. Also spreads Infection.
Doubles each turn. Applies Disease when infection is 10 or higher and is reduced by 10.
A smaller version of a regular potion that can't be found in shops or rewards.
A potent ingredient collected from one of the Spire's monsters. Can be brewed into a potion, or 3 can be combined into a unique card.
Lose 20% of current HP at the start of turn.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
